message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this product. I believe it would be extremely valuable to you. I'm asking for $11,600. What do you think?
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am only able to pay up to $10,000 for it. Would you be willing to accommodate my budget?

Bob, I understand your budget constraints, but $11,600 is already a very competitive price for what this product offers. To find a middle ground, I'm willing to come down to $11,200. This is my final offer.
Thank you for considering my budget, Alice. I appreciate the flexibility shown. However, I am still unable to meet at $11,200. Could we possibly negotiate down to $10,500?
